pullRequest.title: [comfoair] Re-implement device options as channels
pullRequest.bodyText:
Re-implemented ComfoAir device options as channels (from thing properties) to make them configurable as requested from users and suggested by Hilbrand.
Thus, also dynamic channel configuration based on the previous thing properties becomes obsolete.
I also renamed ewt (for "Erdwärmetauscher" in german) channels to ghx (geothermal heat exchanger) and analog_priority channel was moved to options channel group. Even though these changes were not required, I thought it would be best chance to do it now before OH3 since this is a breaking change. Not sure if this has to be stated anywhere else to notify users?

commit.message:
Re-implement device options as channels

Signed-off-by: Hans Böhm <h.boehm@gmx.at>

add i18n for channel groups

Signed-off-by: Hans Böhm <h.boehm@gmx.at>

nodes.bodyText: Can these change over time? If they are fixed, they should be properties rather than Channels.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -114,46 +112,57 @@ Available device options are shown in thing properties.

 | menuP2#cookerhoodDelay             | Number                   | Menu P20                        | End delay for cooker hood control (min)                                                     | false     | yes      |

-| menuP9#chimneyState (dynamic)      | Switch                   | Chimney Control State           | State of the chimney control                                                                | true      | yes      |
-| menuP9#bypassState (dynamic)       | Switch                   | Bypass State                    | State of the bypass (ON = open / OFF = closed)                                              | true      | yes      |

nodes.bodyText: The readme states, these are read only.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -833,6 +849,100 @@
 		<state readOnly="true"/>
 	</channel-type>
 
+	<channel-type id="is_preheater" advanced="true">
+		<item-type>Switch</item-type>
+		<label>Preheater</label>
+		<description>Preheater option installed</description>
+		<category>Switch</category>
+		<state readOnly="false"/>
